story:
Once upon a time in a small pueblo in Mexico, there was a magical place called El Jardín Encantado, the Enchanted Garden. This enchanted place was hidden deep in the heart of the pueblo, and only those who truly believed in magic could find it.

The Enchanted Garden was filled with beautiful, vibrant flowers, twinkling trees, and sparkling streams. The air was always fresh with the sweet scent of blooming flowers, and all the creatures who lived there were friendly and helpful.

One day, a young girl named Rosa, who lived with her mother in the pueblo, was walking home after a long day at school. She was feeling tired and a little sad because she didn't have any friends her age to play with.

As she walked down the dusty road, she suddenly heard a soft voice calling her name. She looked around, but she couldn't see anyone. Then, she heard the voice again, clearer this time: "Rosa, this way, come and find me."

Without hesitation, Rosa followed the voice until she stumbled upon a tiny, hidden entrance to the Enchanted Garden. She stepped inside and was amazed at the beauty surrounding her. She soon came across a group of friendly animals - a wise old tortoise, a chatty parrot, and a curious rabbit.

The animals welcomed Rosa with open arms and led her to meet the Guardian of El Jardín Encantado - an ancient, kind-hearted tree who could talk and move around. The Guardian told Rosa that she was a very special girl and that she had the gift of magic within her.

Rosa couldn't believe her ears. She had always dreamed of having magical powers and now, it seemed, her dream had come true. The Guardian taught her how to harness the magic inside her and showed her the many wonders of the Enchanted Garden.

With each passing day, Rosa grew stronger in her magical abilities. She could create beautiful flowers out of thin air, heal sick animals, and even change the weather.

But most importantly, Rosa found true friendship in the Enchanted Garden. She spent countless hours playing and laughing with her newfound animal friends, and they soon became inseparable.

One day, Rosa realized that she had been in the Enchanted Garden for a long time and it was getting dark outside. She said goodbye to her friends and promised to return soon. With a heavy heart, she made her way to the entrance, ready to leave the magical world behind.

As she stepped out of the Enchanted Garden, she suddenly heard the voice that had guided her there in the first place. This time, it was different. It was the voice of the Guardian, who said, "Rosa, remember that magic is not just found in special places but also in your heart. Share your gifts and love with others, and they will see the magic in you."

Rosa smiled, understanding the true lesson of her Enchanted Garden adventure. And even though she never found the Enchanted Garden again, she carried its magic with her always, spreading love and happiness wherever she went.

From then on, Rosa knew that she could create her own magic, and that the most powerful magic of all was friendship and love.

And with that, my dear child, it's time for us to close our eyes and find our own magic inside our hearts. Goodnight and sweet dreams, filled with love and enchantment.
